subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, said Wednesday that he was willing to help create a playoff format to decide a national championship for the top level of college football.
snippet: Mark Emmert, the N.C.A.A. president, said Wednesday that he was willing to help create a playoff format to decide a national championship for the top level of college football.
